channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jack Smith has resigned from the justice department, after submitting his Trump report
item.description: Special counsel Jack Smith has resigned from the Justice Department after submitting his report on President-elect Donald Trump, amid legal wrangling ...

item.title: States are preparing to help or thwart Trump’s second-term plans
Powerful winter storm across Southern U.S. maintains its icy grip
item.description: Temperatures plunged in some areas turning melting snow into ice and turning roadways treacherous.

item.title: Strong winds pick up, increasing fire danger as firefighters battle LA blazes
item.description: Large parts of Southern California are once again under wildfire risks as strong winds and dry conditions return this weekend through Wednesday.

item.title: Biden awards Pope Francis the Presidential Medal of Freedom with distinction
item.description: The White House commended Pope Francis for his commitment to serving the poor, as well as advocating for peace and protecting the planet.

item.title: Crews battle Palisades Fire flare-up in Mandeville Canyon
item.description: Crews were fighting to keep the Palisades Fire from destroying more homes on Saturday evening, after the blaze spread into Mandeville Canyon in the Ho...

item.title: TV bailiff accused in wife's shooting death: "I didn't pull the trigger"
item.description: Renard Spivey says he was trying to protect himself when he says his wife Patricia confronted him at gunpoint in their Houston home.

item.title: Los Angeles County medical examiner’s office confirms wildfire death toll rises to 16
item.description: The Los Angeles County medical examiner’s office says the confirmed death toll from the wildfires ravaging the area has risen to 16.

item.title: LA firefighters battle to contain monster inferno as death toll rises
item.description: The Palisades blaze is threatening Brentwood, one of the most affluent enclaves of America's second-biggest city.

item.title: USDA report finds Boar's Head listeria outbreak was due to poor sanitation practices
item.description: A report released by the Department of Agriculture found that poor sanitation practices at a Boar's Head facility in Virginia contributed to the large...

item.title: 1/11: CBS Weekend News
item.description: New evacuations ordered as stubborn Palisades Fire expands east in Los Angeles; California communities step up to help fire victims

item.title: Californians scrambled to evacuate dogs, cats, horses, even pigs as LA flames closed in
'Everything is gone' - Agony on a tight-knit LA street razed by inferno
item.description: Lifelong neighbours of West Las Flores Drive banded together, even as their community burned down.

item.title: Is it a bomb? Is it a plane crash? No, it's space junk landing
item.description: The Kenyan villagers surprised by falling satellite debris heralding a new year full of surprises.

item.title: Sudanese army claims capture of key eastern city from rebels
item.description: The development marks one of the most significant gains for the army in its almost two-year long war with rebel forces.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Nostalgia and passion fuel young couple running old-school photo lab
item.description: Fabriccio and Lucía run the only fully equipped film lab in Central America

item.title: A winter storm wraps up in the South, with travel delays and power outages persisting
item.description: The significant winter storm had passed in the South by Saturday morning, but travel issues and power outages were still ongoing.
